text: chaur anak( mdeay) dak ke( mou sa) chaul tow knong heb haey dak heb noh tow knong t ne l( t ne l ni l now ehsaib) pelnoh t ne l nung noam ke towkean meatchrang daembi aoy sa trauv robsa yeung ning sa trauv robsa ke reusa yk ke( tow chenhchum) . haey yeung ban phdal aoy anak nouv sechakdei sraleanh pi yeung ning daembi aoy ke chenhchum beibach theroksaa anak kraom kar khleameul robsa yeung
